verbs.description: [ARG1: sf transbay transit center] [V: remains] [ARG3: closed] [ARGM-TMP: after cracked beam found building inspectors] worked overnight to assess the safety of san francisco new transbay transit center after a crack in a steel beam was discovered tuesday the 2 2 billion hub for buses and eventually trains which opened just last month was abruptly closed tuesday afternoon after workers installing ceiling tiles on a third - floor bus deck saw a crack in a 6½-foot structural beam officials with the transbay joint powers authority which built and operates the transit center did not know the cause of the crack nor its severity but were worried about the beam potential for failure they said the three - block - long transit center and its celebrated rooftop park would remain closed until the problem was thoroughly assessed mark zabaneh millennium tower millennium tower las vegas beam executive director san francisco transbay joint powers authority vallejo transbay transit center mare island the chronicle skanska new york temporary transbay terminal skanska usa xkt engineering

[ARG1: sf transbay transit center] remains [V: closed] [ARGM-TMP: after cracked beam found building inspectors worked overnight to assess the safety of san francisco new transbay transit center after a crack in a steel beam was discovered tuesday the 2 2 billion hub for buses and eventually trains which opened just last month was abruptly closed tuesday afternoon after] workers installing ceiling tiles on a third - floor bus deck saw a crack in a 6½-foot structural beam officials with the transbay joint powers authority which built and operates the transit center did not know the cause of the crack nor its severity but were worried about the beam potential for failure they said the three - block - long transit center and its celebrated rooftop park would remain closed until the problem was thoroughly assessed mark zabaneh millennium tower millennium tower las vegas beam executive director san francisco transbay joint powers authority vallejo transbay transit center mare island the chronicle skanska new york temporary transbay terminal skanska usa xkt engineering

sf transbay transit center remains closed after [V: cracked] [ARG1: beam] found building inspectors worked overnight to assess the safety of san francisco new transbay transit center after a crack in a steel beam was discovered tuesday the 2 2 billion hub for buses and eventually trains which opened just last month was abruptly closed tuesday afternoon after workers installing ceiling tiles on a third - floor bus deck saw a crack in a 6½-foot structural beam officials with the transbay joint powers authority which built and operates the transit center did not know the cause of the crack nor its severity but were worried about the beam potential for failure they said the three - block - long transit center and its celebrated rooftop park would remain closed until the problem was thoroughly assessed mark zabaneh millennium tower millennium tower las vegas beam executive director san francisco transbay joint powers authority vallejo transbay transit center mare island the chronicle skanska new york temporary transbay terminal skanska usa xkt engineering
